review: So much easier than having to turn on the Xbox to watch video streaming! Makes any TV into a smart TV. One of the best features in my opinion is the music streaming, paired with the Amazon music cloud, I uploaded all of my music collection (20GB) and created many playlists which I then stream to the fire stick while about in the apartment or when people are over. Video streaming works flawlessly as well.
author: Chris

review: Easy to set-up & get going. We are now considering cutting the cable cord off. We have more than enough channels/shows/movies to watch w/Amazon Prime, Netflix & Hulu. You can also subscribe to HBO/Showtime or even ESPN if you want more to watch. The user interface responds pretty quickly, but I think that's because we have a faster internet service. We are thinking of giving these out as Xmas gifts to our family. So, far we love it & have only had it for almost 2 weeks now. We love how small & compact it is, bc if we were to travel; it'd be easy to take it along w/us & still enjoy the services we paid for. The only con, I can think of is that if you lose your remote; you're kinda SOL.:/ Wish there was a button or something to locate the remote; that would be awesome.
author: Joanna Failano
